Name: Flash Mirage
Desc:
Performs swift archery to create the illusion of shooting a bow.
Whenever an arrow hits the enemy for a certain number of times, creates an illusion to shoot an arrow tracking the enemy and disappears. The arrow attacks a single enemy in front of the illusion and penetrates enemies in a straight line. Installable Arrow Platter is not considered your direct attack.
Additionally enhances Wind.
Can be toggled On/Off
